SEARCH
Package it.polimi.ingsw.am49.server.controller.room

Class Room

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.am49.server.controller.room.Room
Direct Known Subclasses:
RestoredRoom
public class Room extends Object
The Room class represents a game room where players can join, leave, and play a game. It manages player information, game state, and communication with clients.

  • Field Details

    • roomName

      protected final String roomName
      Name of the room. This should be unique within the server.

    • server

      protected final ServerApp server
      Server on witch there is this room

    • maxPlayers

      protected final int maxPlayers
      Number of players of the game being played in this room. This number is not equal to the number of connected clients (some clients may have crashed).

    • currentPlayers

      protected int currentPlayers

    • usernamesToPlayers

      protected final HashMap<String,PlayerInfo> usernamesToPlayers

    • game

      protected Game game

    • gameStarted

      protected boolean gameStarted

    • pauseTimer

      protected Timer pauseTimer

    • forwaitTimeoutInSecond

      protected final int forwaitTimeoutInSecond
      See Also:

  • Constructor Details

    • Room

      public Room(String roomName, int maxPlayers, ClientHandler creatorClient, String creatorUsername, ServerApp server)
      Constructor for the Room class.
      Parameters:
      roomName - the name of the room
      maxPlayers - the maximum number of players allowed in the room
      creatorClient - the client handler of the room creator
      creatorUsername - the username of the room creator
      server - the server application

    • Room

      protected Room(String roomName, ServerApp server, int maxPlayers)

  • Method Details

    • addNewPlayer

      public void addNewPlayer(ClientHandler playerClient, String playerUsername) throws JoinRoomException, GameAlreadyStartedException
      Adds a new player to the room.
      Parameters:
      playerClient - the client handler of the new player
      playerUsername - the username of the new player
      Throws:
      JoinRoomException - if the player cannot join the room
      GameAlreadyStartedException - if the game has already started

    • reconnect

      public CompleteGameInfo reconnect(ClientHandler playerClient, String playerUsername) throws JoinRoomException
      Reconnects a player to the game.
      Parameters:
      playerClient - the client handler of the player
      playerUsername - the username of the player
      Returns:
      the complete game information for the player
      Throws:
      JoinRoomException - if the player cannot reconnect to the game

    • removePlayer

      public boolean removePlayer(ClientHandler client)
      Removes a player from the room.
      Parameters:
      client - the client handler of the player to be removed
      Returns:
      true if the player was successfully removed, false otherwise

    • removePlayerFromGame

      protected void removePlayerFromGame(PlayerInfo playerInfo)
      Removes a player from the game.
      Parameters:
      playerInfo - the player information of the player to be removed

    • startPauseTimer

      protected void startPauseTimer()
      Starts the pause timer for the game.

      Sets the forfeit winner and destroys the room

    • stopPauseTimer

      protected void stopPauseTimer()
      Stops the pause timer for the game.

    • clientReady

      public void clientReady(ClientHandler client, Color color) throws RoomException
      The Server will call this method to communicate to the room that the specified client is ready to play the game with the chosen color.
      Parameters:
      client - the client readying up
      color - the chosen color of the client
      Throws:
      RoomException - if something goes wrong

    • clientNoMoreReady

      public void clientNoMoreReady(ClientHandler client) throws RoomException
      Marks a client as no longer ready to play.
      Parameters:
      client - the client handler of the player
      Throws:
      RoomException - if something goes wrong

    • isGameOver

      public boolean isGameOver()
      Checks if the game is over.
      Returns:
      true if the game is over, false otherwise

    • allPlayersReady

      protected boolean allPlayersReady()
      Checks if all players are ready to play.
      Returns:
      true if all players are ready, false otherwise

    • startGame

      protected void startGame()
      Starts the game.

    • executeGameAction

      public void executeGameAction(ClientHandler client, GameAction action) throws InvalidActionException, NotYourTurnException
      Executes a game action.
      Parameters:
      client - the client handler of the player
      action - the game action to be executed
      Throws:
      InvalidActionException - if the action is invalid
      NotYourTurnException - if it is not the player's turn

    • checkIfNewPlayerCanJoin

      protected void checkIfNewPlayerCanJoin(ClientHandler playerClient, String playerUsername) throws JoinRoomException, GameAlreadyStartedException
      Checks if a client attempting to join the room is allowed to do so. Throws a JoinRoomException if not. This method is mainly used by addNewPlayer(ClientHandler, String).
      Parameters:
      playerClient - the client trying to join
      playerUsername - the username that the client chose
      Throws:
      JoinRoomException - if the client cannot join the room
      GameAlreadyStartedException - if the game has already started

    • getClientByUsername

      protected ClientHandler getClientByUsername(String username)
      Gets the client handler by username.
      Parameters:
      username - the username of the player
      Returns:
      the client handler of the player

      Returns:
      true if the username corresponds to the client handler, false otherwise
